name: Dream Fibres
description:
Secrets will unravel in Dream Fibres, a first person, 3D, investigative game which centres around the mysterious deaths of the Wilkinson family.

Play as Detective Bernard Richards, a veteran investigator of the dream world. With his trusty dream catcher, he can go back into the past through the victim's dreams to solve mysterious cases. 

28 years ago, when Detective Richards was just a rookie, the Wilkinson family died after their son Billy set the family house on fire. 

Billy always claimed something else happened before the fire, but whatever evidence may have been, was destroyed in the blaze.

On the surface, the Wilkinson family seemed perfect, but as you delve into their dreams, you discover nothing is as good as it seems.

Dream Fibers is a student project made by a team of three.
